Description: Fragment of sub-round handle from neck join to sharp turn of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora. Clay fine pink-buff; cream slip. Circular stamp with Helios head symbol.
Curator's comments: Name Iason. Probably from same die as Alexandria, Greco-Roman Museum, ABC 0143.12.
Bibliographic references: Stoddart 1847 / Memoir on the inscribed pottery of Rhodes, Cnidus and other Greek Cities (167)
